title: Simple Digital Watch face
summary: Simple  watch face that shows your heartbeat, battery level and current time.
description: Simple digital watch face that shows your heartbeat, battery level and current time, of course. No more, no less.
descriptionHTML:
Simple digital watch face that shows your heartbeat, battery level and current time, of course.
No more, no less.
comments: Really bad for my watch Leaves heart rate monitor on all of the time. Either runs down battery quickly or causes watch to crash on my Samsung Gear Live.
Drains battery very quickly due to running the heart rate monitor at all times. Otherwise nice watch face
run battery down, fast and having hard time changing the time to 12 hr mode, it's always at 24hr
recentChanges: Shows current time, heartbit and battery level.
